relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: ID3 Metadata for MP3
description: Structured data chunk containing descriptive metadata about the file to which it is appended, virtually always an MP3_FF (MP3 sound file). Permits the identification of title, artist, date, genre, etc.
